name: Aero
feature: Single Page Application gives you a better experience.
Role-based Private Route Implemented (Admin, User, and Seller).
You can explore our blogs to enhance your knowledge.
Firebase Authentication with JWT Implementation.
Used React-Hook-Forms for better user experiences.
Used React Query and Axios for data fetching.
Support any device size with Responsive (mobile-friendly) Design.

name: The Gallery
feature: Single Page Application gives you a better experience.
6 Main Routes Home, Services, Blogs, Login, My Reviews and Add Services.
Users can edit/delete their reviews and services.
Private Route Implemented.
Firebase Authentication with JWT Implementation for the user.
Dynamic Title Change Hooks implemented.
React-photo-view used for full zoom photo.
You can explore our blogs to enhance your knowledge.

name: Spark Learning
